mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TLOG(TLOG_TITLE, TLOG_CONTENT, WRITE_TIME, MEMBER_ID, SCHEDULE_NO) VALUES(#{tlogTitle}, #{tlogContent}, now(), #{memberId}, #{scheduleNo});

INSERT INTO TLOGIMAGE(UPLOAD_NAME, STORE_NAME, TLOG_NO) VALUES
(#{item.uploadName}, #{item.storeName}, #{item.tlogNo})
mapper.select: SELECT A.TLOG_NO, A.TLOG_TITLE, A.TLOG_CONTENT, A.MEMBER_ID, B.STORE_NAME FROM TLOG A JOIN (SELECT STORE_NAME, TLOG_NO FROM (SELECT STORE_NAME, TLOG_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TLOG_NO ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS RN FROM TLOGIMAGE) AS RANKEDROWS WHERE RN=1) B ON A.TLOG_NO=B.TLOG_NO ORDER BY A.WRITE_TIME DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{size};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FAV WHERE TLOG_NO=#{tlogNo} AND MEMBER_ID=#{memberId};
